metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3358 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A null pointer dereference was found in the Linux kernel's Integrated Sensor Hub (ISH) driver. This issue could allow a local user to crash the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
